attributes.action: Demand that Rt Hon David Lammy MP resigns for trying to defy the Brexit vote
attributes.background: Rt Hon David Lammy MP - Member of Parliament for Tottenham has urged parliament to ignore the 52% of the public who backed a leave vote and has defied Democracy. We now demand that action is taken against this MP and all others who try to take our democracy away.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
